name: Intensive Mender
description: Conjure a ghostly spirit to do your bidding and stay by your side for 8 seconds. The spirit heals you or the lowest Health ally around you every 2 seconds, restoring 2742 Health.  Creates a corpse on death.
effectLines: The spirit heals for twice the amount, but lasts half as long and costs half as much.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Conjure a ghostly spirit to do your bidding and stay by your side for 8 seconds. The spirit heals you or the lowest Health ally around you every 2 seconds, restoring $1 Health.  Creates a corpse on death.
rawDescription:

Creates a corpse on death.
